WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="95c199e8fe2f4c9b90db830cf98cbc2a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Let us see your Dandori practice in action.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="1031c9153ccb4fbb9012837f0bb7ef6d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Please, show me your skills.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="61d32e58d2e74041a359a5403d775c3f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Mmm... Let's begin your training!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_03: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="9dbda1a7f71d4784a62e3e3207303822" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Your reward will now be...[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]White Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"]!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Start_04: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="29446c679fac466aa81b24c31d6f4160" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Work hard for your [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Purple Pikmin[System:Color name="Default"] reward!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GoodProgress_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="2c9924cdfef644408b04ca68ee206064" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ah, you're doing quite well.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GoodProgress_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="d4b7ef1f8c6d462189dbe480ac0a236a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Your Dandori skills are praiseworthy!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_LastOneMin_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="a8619b74eaba44a09ba00225b17aa10b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Your time is running out...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_LastOneMin_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f8609af96d3d4c598290e8efdec0b364" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Come now. Pick up the pace!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f0bd15f8189d4633a158e491645840cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The trick to successful Dandori?
Mastering the art of delegation!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="862b6af7c84e4adab3fa04a531c7451f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Think about how to order your tasks now...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="00072fc1aabc4c85ba3f6d1ffdc18008" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Remember to consult your map!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_03: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="9418fca028c340f7abca48e2b8646b97" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Commit to your training!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_04: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="87ddf11a271f4e9fb3e96af5b0b7fe43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Mmm... You remind me of a young me.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Enliven_05: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="129f46d82163496188fc7c20ab4c5bf5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]This is no time to daydream!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetItem_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6d59c8f4191f4a7fadd2e8951fae0ac7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Dandori masters make use of all they find!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetItem_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="d0bbe671f7fa40b89d49b27d53306d89" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Mmm... An item is meant to be used.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_SeijinDown_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="5df7c7ce8fee48998a23a16952b867c7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]What's that? Ah, you got sloppy.
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Perhaps [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can rouse you...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_SeijinDown_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f0a09588ae784b1f8c3ff619f60cb1ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Try not to overdo it next time.
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Ask [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to wake you up!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_DogDown_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="d88d8d47330f46cc9081acdcd9878c20" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Looks like [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has been knocked out.
[Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You'll need to rouse him!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_DogDown_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c4de0f4569ca4023b718d473fe8abdc4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]You've pushed [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] too hard.
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]You'd better go take care of him now.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Disappearance_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="2794b9da60af4bb1a04b7b664ccc77ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Your Pikmin have been wiped out!
[Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Perhaps it's best to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]start over[System:Color name="Default"] now?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Disappearance_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="65c9357bbe2241aaa783425d168fb415" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You don't seem to have any Pikmin...
[Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Are you planning to continue?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetCloser_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6b22f861c7d74afda96499ed8bee73c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Be sure to transport that with great care.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetCloser_Object_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b324701301664a1a97236f8fb0156c55" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Gather those raw materials!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_GetCloser_Object_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="580d6ed478e74995be306b0b6cc1da94" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Do you wish to open that door?
First you must collect enough treasure!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_00: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b93f13ddf6e0474da767fa8a5072c13d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Now...how would one open that door?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c18dd1b6eed6437ca0904031a502a880" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Mmm... Collect [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]3 pieces of treasure[System:Color name="Default"]!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c7d3da0d24464560b9290edfa60177f6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Don't forget you can use creatures too!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_StrategyTips_03: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="89938bc354e540f0ac62f095a5289afd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]When do you plan on switching the circuit?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_00_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="faae8f9ffa2a4ba9aeb39e75557486dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]No need to transport defeated enemies!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_00_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="5a33c29b23f54de79662d604bf5bd636" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The order in which you defeat them is key.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_01_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6e60b3173bb1496aad9e4a52451ef024" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Do not let your Pikmin freeze now.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_01_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="0fc7a445af654f0ea65a816a018bbd60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ah, make good use of the fire starters.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_02_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="e991fffa01c349819c9ba1cde61ac873" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Remember to use your Pikmin wisely!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_02_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="4066162773a8402eaa1a7b61b0d2e360" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Avoiding needless conflict is a must!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_03_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="50989d5f220d4145b657169aa6685ad0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Winged Pikmin transport things faster.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_03_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="2680d6b5f0b84d62981ebf2b8c679f34" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Watch where you use Ultra-Spicy Spray!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_04_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="8f6f6f599ac24871b1c1939da3a270be" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Winged Pikmin have access to shortcuts...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_04_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="15b8983b2a174f5086a535b78c22846e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Use Bouncy Mushrooms to save time!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_05_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="abc31d6d11544d8b83fe89a366365701" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Observe the mechanism[System:Color name="Default"] closely.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_05_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6d06678d734244fa94576280d6b958b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]This mechanism... Can you unlock it?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_06_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="7577445c285c4901b8709dfbed905f6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Mmm... Shearfleas. Such nuisances!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_06_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="720820c61d3a4dd99d7e5c7e73b6925d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You must direct [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] with care!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_07_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="092d4489ae4e4f178aabc66e6bdb3106" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Dividing up your work with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is vital!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_07_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="180ed5e232774a938c4909b107c79366" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]White and purple are very useful colors...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_08_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="8fa75746e95b40b28dd97806d618731e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ah yes. Aren't these creatures pesky!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_08_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="49cf1ab9310c42d2a0cb4f620f4a2b9c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Use your Purple Pikmin strategically now...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_09_01: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b2ba5f0c83064fe59ecc9c271b5e28e3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Decide now [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]what you do not need to do[System:Color name="Default"]!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_ProgressRateLow_09_02: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="b85112bcb603459b855e5ba5931888e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] must work as a team!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Happy_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="5516eed58e2b4ad18215219f4e4ba518" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] seems troubled...
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Happy_GuruGuru_Carry: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="f3cd2bfd2c6f492eaa770a62f6dfc9a8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Oh, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! You can't carry that there.
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Pikmin_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="be5aac63cab14a1e98d54c192ff5f7a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Lead your Pikmin properly now!
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Avatar_GuruGuru: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="6cc170a01af4464ab42a99aac330bf98" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]You look lost. Do you have a plan?
WaveEXCave.EXCave_Avatar_GuruGuru_Carry: [Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="44e7826a190c4ef3b109aec23011bd78" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hmm. You can't carry that out of there.
